H0.text: Plasmodesmata are microscopic channels that traverse the cell walls of plants.

H1.text: Chloroplasts are the microscopic channels that traverse the cell walls of plants.

H2.text: Sphenopalatine is the name of microscopic channels which traverse the cell walls of plants.

H3.text: Notochord is the name of microscopic channels which traverse the cell walls of plants.

A4.text: Plasmodesmata (singular: plasmodesma) are microscopic channels which traverse the cell walls of plant cells and some algal cells, enabling transport and communication between them.
